plot: Yeon-cheol arrives at his girlfriend's village only to discover that the citizens have been driven out by bandits who are using the town to ambush a truck full of gold that will be driving through
title: Daepyogaek
plot_es: Yeon-cheol arrives at his girlfriend's village only to discover that the citizens have been driven out by bandits who are using the town to ambush a truck full of gold that will be driving through
